subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Coaches and Managers
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Bruce Pearl led the Volunteers to the N.C.A.A. tournament in all six of his seasons but admitted lying to the N.C.A.A. and drew university and Southeastern Conference sanctions.
snippet: Bruce Pearl led the Volunteers to the N.C.A.A. tournament in all six of his seasons but admitted lying to the N.C.A.A. and drew university and Southeastern Conference sanctions.
